alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, northeastern Prentiss, eastern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leedy, or 11 miles southeast of Corinth, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Burnsville, Glen, Pineflat, Leedy, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Rienzi, Counce, Damon, Doskie, Strickland, Southside, Caffey, Tulu, Jobes, Acton and Walker Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
